_sText:
DE_Stealth


A Counter-Strike: Source map Inspired by Black Mesa: Source.

Note that the screenshots have been made with awful video card, (built-in the CPU) It will look better for you

The story:

Terrorists have an underground facility with secret plans, the counter-terrorists came across on it and entered from the opened SILO 2, which is in preparation for taking off. But Terrorists don't want their plans to be discovered and decided to self-destruct the whole base. This can be done if the rocket in the silo is bombed or the biological weapons in the train loading station. This corresponds to bombsite A and B.

- The map should be balanced for each team.

This map is intended to look a bit like BM:S. I put alot of effort into this, I hope you like it.

btw the silo hatch is brushwork, im very proud of it lol

Features:

- Optimisation, has FPS as if you play maps like cs_assault, de_inferno, cs_italy etc.
- Radar Overview
- HDR
- Cubemaps

Big thanks to Meurglis3 Who Made Great Hand-Tuned NAV file - If you want to play with smarter bots.

Enjoy. Comment are much appreciated :)
